faqs.question: How long do 3D mouth guards last?
faqs.answer: Lifespan depends on usage and bite forces. We outline expected replacement cycles and review fit at check-ups.

faqs.question: Can I get a backup guard?
faqs.answer: Yes. Once your design is approved, we can print a spare from the same file for travel or training.

faqs.question: Are they suitable for heavy grinding?
faqs.answer: We select thickness and materials based on your grinding pattern and may suggest specific wear schedules to protect the guard and your teeth.

faqs.question: Will the guard affect speech?
faqs.answer: There may be short-term adaptation. We aim for a slim profile and smooth edges to keep speech clear once you adjust.

faqs.question: What if my bite changes?
faqs.answer: Bring the guard to your review. We can assess and reprint or adjust using your stored scan so the fit remains comfortable.
